titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Stephanie Tubbs Jones, a Representative of the State of Ohio.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1415.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/8/2008--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Stephanie Tubbs Jones, a former Representative from Ohio. Declares that when the House adjourns on September 8, 2008, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Tubbs Jones.
